titleStmt.title: The treasury of deuotion Contayning diuers pious prayers, & exercises both practicall, and speculatiue. Togeather vvith the seauen little offices in Latin and English: and sundry other deuotions, for yong beginners in vertue. Collected by I.VV.P.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, ca. 1575-ca. 1645?

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.

C4r is a separate title page, with same imprint date, reading: Weekly little offices in Latin and English. Whereof that of our B. Ladyes conception, is to be sayed euery day; togeather with one of the other, set downe in order for the weeke. Collected by I.VV.P.
Some print faded; some pages torn.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
